item.title: Starbucks to lay off 1,100 corporate workers as sales sag
item.description: Starbucks made the layoff announcement after four straight quarters of falling same-store sales.

item.title: Ex-Secret Service agent and conservative media personality Dan Bongino picked as FBI deputy director
5 things to know before the stock market opens Monday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: Voters flock to political extremes in Germany as the centrist parties stumble
item.description: Both the far-right Alternative fuer Deutschland and the far-left Die Linke saw significant gains and were the most popular parties among young people.

item.title: The Trump administration is firing 2,000 USAID workers and putting thousands of others on leave
item.description: The Trump administration said it is eliminating 2,000 positions at the U.S. Agency for International Development and placing all but a fraction on lea...
